# [Interview #482: Driving Mr. Sanderson - Matt Hatch, Entry #9](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=482#9)

#### Matt Hatch

Ok. This is a fun one that I don’t think I’ve heard before, can the Creator use the True Power?

#### Brandon Sanderson

RAFO.
